resources.string:
Legend Group Corp. is one of Indonesia's largest restaurant company, operating 50 different restaurants and cafés, in over 1500 locations across the nation. 

 	 One of the most developed and famous café they own is Café Legend, located in Jenderal Sudirman Street, SCBD, South Jakarta 

 	 Café Legend brings a touch of artistic style to South Jakarta's fashionable neighbourhood that provides a casual but homely ambience for enjoying the comforting flavors of both Western and Asian dishes. 

 	 Café Legend App is a simple mobile app owned by Legend Group Corp. to facilitate the customers in ordering menu at Café Legend.
Jenderal Sudirman Street Number 15A-C, SCBD, South Jakarta
